entry.title: Grandma Yellen Stepping to the Mic
entry.content:
We’re in a holding pattern, as Janet Yellen is stepping up to the mic tomorrow, so watch out for movements afterwards, and stay on the sidelines in the meantime.

Trade idea that triggered last night was the AUD/JPY. I’m still waiting on UNG to go a bit higher before shorting. Follow me on Twitter to get my real-time updates on my entries and positions.
